name: The 6th Int'l Conference on Organic Chemistry
content: Important NOTE: Due to COVID-19 epidemic situation all over the world, most countries still maintain a strict policy of no-gathering, no-entering and leaving the country, and 14-days quarantine. We have to postpone the conference till July 16-18, 2021 in Kunming, China. The 6th Int'l Conference on Organic Chemistry (COC 2021) Conference Date: July 16-18, 2021 Conference Venue: Kunming, China Website: https://www.confjuly.org/conference/COC2021/ Online Registration System: https://www.confjuly.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1359 Email: intelconf@163.com The 6th Int'l Conference on Organic Chemistry (COC 2021) will be held from July 16-18, 2021 in Kunming, China. COC 2021 will cover issues on Applied Organic Chemistry/Organic Chemical Engineering, Bioorganic and Medicinal Chemistry, Classification of Organic Compounds, Macromolecular Chemistry, Metal, Organic and Enzyme Catalysis, Novel Organic Materials (Design, Synthesis, Characterization), etc. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. If you wish to serve the conference as an invited speaker, please send email to us with your CV. We'll contact with you asap. Publication and Presentation Publication: Open Access Journalï¼Œplease contact us for detailed information Index: CNKI and Google Scholar Note: If you want to present your research results but do NOT wish to publish a paper, you may simply submit an Abstract to our Registration System. Contact Us Email: intelconf@163.com Tel: +86 132 6470 2250 QQ: 1349406763, 3025797047 WeChat: 3025797047 Attendance Methods 1.Submit full paper (Regular Attendance+Paper Publication+Presentation) You are welcome to submit full paper, all the accepted papers will be published by Open access journal. 2\. Submit abstract (Regular Attendance+Abstract+Presentation) 3\. Regular Attendance (No Submission Required) Conference Topics Applied Organic Chemistry / Organic Chemical Engineering Bioorganic and Medicinal Chemistry Classification of Organic Compounds Interaction of Organic Materials with Living Matter for Implantable Biodevices Interfaces in Organic Electronics Macromolecular Chemistry Metal, Organic and Enzyme Catalysis Natural Products and Heterocyclic Chemistry Novel Organic Materials (Design, Synthesis, Characterization) Organic Chemical Spectroscopic Analysis Organic Geochemistry Organic Materials for Clean Energy Production and Storage Organic Photochemistry Organic Reactions Organic Sensors, towards Biomedics Organic Surfaces and Their Properties Organic Synthesis / Asymmetric Synthesis / Drug Synthesis Organometallic Chemistry Physical Organic Chemistry Properties of Organic Compounds Requirements and Applications of Organic Electronics Solid-state Organic Chemistry Spintronics in Organic Materials and Nanostructures Structure and Mechanism Theoretical Organic Chemistry Other related issues
